Reference: MaxHangs Hangboard Routine For Finger Strength
Author: Eva López

Workouts.Name: MaxHangs MED
Workouts.Description: Minimum edge with no added weight. 1. Choose an edge on which you can hang for only 6 – 20 seconds. 2. Hang for 5 – 15 seconds (leave a 1 – 5-second margin), rest for 3 – 5 minutes. 3. Complete 2 – 5 sets.

Sets.Description: Do a 12-second hang using a feature that you can barely hold for 15 seconds with maximum effort.
Do a 12-second hang using a feature that you can barely hold for 15 seconds with maximum effort.
Do a 12-second hang using a feature that you can barely hold for 15 seconds with maximum effort.
Do a 12-second hang using a feature that you can barely hold for 15 seconds with maximum effort.

Workouts.Name: MaxHangs MAW
Workouts.Description: Minimum edge with added weight. 1. Choose a grip position to train. 2. Add enough weight to be able to hang for only 6 – 20 seconds. 3. Hang for 5 – 15 seconds (leave a 1 – 5-second margin), rest for 3 – 5 minutes. 4. Complete 2 – 5 sets.

Sets.Description: Do a 12-second hang using a feature that you can barely hold for 15 seconds with maximum effort.
Do a 12-second hang using a feature that you can barely hold for 15 seconds with maximum effort.
Do a 12-second hang using a feature that you can barely hold for 15 seconds with maximum effort.
